main event: On April 12, 1967, a witness in Bronx, N.Y. observed a self-luminous round object with a glowing ring around it.
interesting points: The observer saw the object descend silently to within 350 feet from the ground,The object emitted a bluish-white glow and was about 50 feet in diameter,The sighting lasted approximately three minutes,The observer had previous UFO sightings, and the case was categorized as insufficient data for evaluation by the Air Force,Similar sightings in the area indicated a consistent pattern of unusual phenomena.
witness description: The witness has experience with radio operation and reported the sighting to the Department of Defense.
